long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension designed to simplify the process of policy management for specified hosts on your Keenetic router. This extension offers a straightforward and efficient way to switch between policies from the available list for a specific host on your network. You can pass all device traffic via a specified connection, such as a VPN or direct connection in one click.
